summary: Based on the Far Eastern myth of the snake woman who is able to take on human form.
cast: Mallika Sherawat|Irrfan Khan|Jeff Doucette|Divya Dutta|Raman Trikha|Mahmoud Babai|Raj Bhansali|Sunny Charles|Tony Ciccone|Parvez Khan|Govind Menon|Sunita Rajwar|Sunit Razdan|Meenakshi Thakur|Javed Rizvi
title: Hisss
